localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Melvin Capital told me to put all my $$$ on the Chiefs tonight. Starting to think that was a mistake
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text: 梅尔文资本让我把所有的钱都投在今晚的酋长队身上。我开始觉得那是个错误
梅爾文資本讓我把所有的錢都投在今晚的酋長隊身上。我開始覺得那是個錯誤

previous.excerpt: Tuti.study is a webapp that helps teachers and students to improve the way they learn online. You can create beautiful annonated presentations, create, save, share your online flashcards with students, friends and colleagues by sharing a link.
previous.title: Tuti - Create beautiful online presentations and flashcards

localize.description: Tuti.study是一款帮助教师和学生改善在线学习方式的网络应用。你可以创建漂亮的注解演示，创建、保存、分享你的在线闪卡，通过分享链接与学生、朋友和同事分享。
localize.tagline: 创建漂亮的在线演示和闪卡

localize.description: Tuti.study是一款幫助教師和學生改善在線學習方式的網絡應用。你可以創建漂亮的註解演示，創建、保存、分享你的在線閃卡，通過分享鏈接與學生、朋友和同事分享。
localize.tagline: 創建漂亮的在線演示和閃卡

next.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps
next.title: LiveCaller - Free web call with online chat, omni channel and co-browsing

localize.description: 网站缺乏沟通渠道，导致客户流失，满意度低，客户成功率极低甚至为零。LiveCaller通过提供所有的解决方案来解决这些问题，它结合了网络呼叫，网络聊天，回电，社交信息应用。
localize.tagline: 免费网络通话，在线聊天，全频道和共同浏览。

localize.description: 網站缺乏溝通渠道，導致客戶流失，滿意度低，客戶成功率極低甚至爲零。LiveCaller通過提供所有的解決方案來解決這些問題，它結合了網絡呼叫，網絡聊天，回電，社交信息應用。
localize.tagline: 免費網絡通話，在線聊天，全頻道和共同瀏覽。
